pullRequest.title: DHFPROD-4775: New endpoint for clearing user data
pullRequest.bodyText:
The interesting new stuff is all in DataHubImpl.
Tossed a bunch of the download-testing stuff into AllArtifactsProject so that it can be reused easily by ClearUserDataTest.
Not updating mocks.json/mocks.yaml yet - going to look into springfox again to see if we can get this stuff generated dynamically from the middle tier endpoints.
Description
Checklist:
- Note: do not change the below


Owner:


 JIRA_ID included in all the commit messages


 PR title is in the format JIRA_ID:Title


 Rebase the branch with upstream


 Squashed all commits into a single commit


 Added Tests


Reviewer:


 Reviewed Tests

beforeCommit.message: More fixes based on runAsUser working correctly

afterCommit.message:
DHFPROD-4775: New endpoint for clearing user data

The interesting new stuff is all in DataHubImpl.

Tossed a bunch of the download-testing stuff into AllArtifactsProject so that it can be reused easily by ClearUserDataTest.

Modified the "runAs*" methods so that the ManageClient runs as the given user too to avoid confusion. This caused a number of existing tests to break, as they were assuming that the ManageClient was still associated with an admin or flow-developer. So I fixed up those tests to ensure they're running as the proper user based on the operation being performed.

The interesting new stuff is all in DataHubImpl.

Modified the "runAs*" methods so that the ManageClient runs as the given user too to avoid confusion. This caused a number of existing tests to break, as they were assuming that the ManageClient was still associated with an admin or flow-developer. So I fixed up those tests to ensure they're running as the proper user based on the operation being performed.
